name: Biometric_Data_Harvesting
postprocess: Analyze biometric template creation, check for unauthorized face/voice recognition model training, verify legitimate authentication vs harvesting patterns.
examples: VNFaceObservation facial recognition running in background without user consent
CoreML face recognition model training on user photos without authorization
SpeechFramework voice pattern extraction during normal conversations
remediation: Disable Face ID/Touch ID temporarily, revoke camera/microphone access, delete biometric data if possible, check for unknown ML models, consider identity theft monitoring.
description: Detects unauthorized collection and analysis of biometric data for identification and surveillance purposes.
